data.system_settings: Meizu M3s 5.1 Flyme 6.7.7.11 beta, Windows 10 x64 Ent LTSB
data.actual_result: Desktop version - all ok. Android version - you cannot modify users with roles higher than your role
data.expected_result: You can add role 3 to person with role higher that you have
data.short_description: Different behavior while giving roles in desktop and Android versions
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a role higher than you (Role 1) and lower than you (Role 3) - Try to give role 3 to someone with role 1
